meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Intuition</kanji> from my <kanji>dialect</kanji> tells me that I should <vocabulary>pardon</vocabulary> you. Give you <vocabulary>forgiveness</vocabulary>. You're lucky I speak this dialect.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
